snippet: WOLMAN--Jean E. New York City. Actress-editor, wife of Dr. Benjamin B. Wolman, died Thursday, February 4, 2016 at age 84. Private service. In lieu of flowers, memorial gifts may be made to St. Jude Children's Research, 501 St. Jude Place, Memphis, TN 38105, www.st.jude.org. 1/3
lead_paragraph: WOLMAN--Jean E. New York City. Actress-editor, wife of Dr. Benjamin B. Wolman, died Thursday, February 4, 2016 at age 84. Private service. In lieu of flowers, memorial gifts may be made to St. Jude Children's Research, 501 St. Jude Place, Memphis, TN 38105, www.st.jude.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOLMAN, JEAN E
